category-def.name: Sonar Java
category-def.label: Sonar Java
category-def.description: Needed feature for analysing JDT projects with Sonar.

category-def.name: Sonar C/C++
category-def.label: Sonar C/C++ (requires Eclipse CDT and the SonarSource C++ plugin)
category-def.description: Needed feature for analysing CDT projects with Sonar.

category-def.name: Sonar Python
category-def.label: Sonar Python (requires Eclipse PyDev and the Sonar Python plugin)
category-def.description: Needed feature for analysing PyDev projects with Sonar.

category-def.name: Sonar Erlang
category-def.label: Sonar Erlang (requires Eclipse ErlIde and the Sonar Erlang plugin)
category-def.description: Needed feature for analysing ErlIde projects with Sonar.
